bug.short_desc: Incorrect behavior when saving PNG image with a filename that includes &
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
After scanning, when saving scan results as a filename that includes & for example 'sed & awk', gscan2pdf is not interpreting the filename correctly.
From the console output:
sh: awk_421.png: command not found sh: awk/sed : No such file or directory
Judging by "command not found" this could be command injection issue as well.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): 1.3.9
How reproducible: consistent
Steps to Reproduce: 1. make scan 2. save as png with filename that includes &
Actual results:
single filename named <name before &>
and error output like sh: awk_421.png: command not found sh: awk/sed : No such file or directory
Expected results:
filenames with &
Additional info:
I can reproduce it with gscan2pdf-1.3.9-2.fc24.noarch.
